definition: The act of gliding down snowy slopes using long, narrow objects attached to one's feet, typically done as a recreational activity or competitive sport.

examples.german: Ich liebe es, Skifahren zu gehen.

examples.english: Skiing is a popular winter sport.

examples.german: Meine Familie geht jedes Jahr Skifahren in den Alpen.
examples.english: My family goes skiing in the Alps every year.

examples.german: Ich habe mir neue Skier gekauft, um besser Skifahren zu k√∂nnen.
examples.english: I bought new skis to be able to ski better.
